item.title: Pi Stack
item.description: Pi Stack The Pi Stack PCB is a custom developed PCB which can be used to create clusters, known as ‘stacks’ of Raspberry Pi compatible single board computers. The Pi Stack was came out of the experiences of building Raspberry Pi clusters using other methods. The first cluster created used Lego as the physical mounting structure. This approach held the raspberry pis together conveniently, but did not help with cable management.
